title: Why Modern Movies Suck - The Myth Of The "Modern Audience"
description:
It seems like everything these days has been "updated for a modern audience." But what exactly does it mean? Who is this "modern audience" that Hollywood is so desperate to cater to? Join me as I do my best to solve this perplexing mystery. 

Want to help The Drinker's very own movie a reality? Then join the Kickstarter for Rogue Elements, a short film written by yours truly: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1000347150/rogue-elements-a-ryan-drake-short-film
